Name: Poly Shoot
About the game: A very simple FPS game. Survive under the colored polygons' attack and destroy them. Grow in battle and acquire new weapons and capabilities. Flexible use of weapons and capabilities to respond to a wide range of objectives. Be careful not to be hit.
